General information.Content: This database contains data from international key comparisons for radionuclide metrology since the inception of the international system of reference (SIR) for radionuclide metrology at the BIPM in 1976.
General information.Note: This version of the machine-readable comparison report is not definitive. The format is under discussion within the CCRI and CIPM to best reflect the requirements of ionizing radiation metrology and to conform to the SI digital framework. Users can use this document to analyse key comparison data and metadata more efficiently with their software. However, users should bear in mind that the format will necessarily evolve in subsequent updates of this key comparison, which will not guarantee the long-term compatibility of their interface.

References.[1]: Romain Coulon et al 2022 Meas. Sci. Technol. 33 024003 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/ac3fc4
References.[2]: Romain Coulon et al 2023 Meas. Sci. Technol. 34 074009 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/accd0b

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85(2004.Reference of the published comparison re: Ratel G. and  Michotte C., BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{85}$Sr, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/41/1A/06006}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2004, \textbf{41}, Tech. Suppl., 06006}

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85(2005.Reference of the published comparison re: Ratel G., Michotte C. and Hino Y., Activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{85}$Sr for the NMIJ, Japan in the ongoing comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85, \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/42/1A/06010}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2005, \textbf{42}, Tech. Suppl., 06010}

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85(2015.Reference of the published comparison re: Michotte C. Ratel G., Courte S., Dziel T. and Listkowska A., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{85}$Sr to include the 2009 result of the POLATOM (Poland), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/52/1A/06022 }{\textit{Metrologia}, 2015, \textbf{52}, Tech. Suppl., 06022}

Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85(2020.Reference of the published comparison re: Michotte C., Courte S., Nonis M., Coulon R., Judge S., N\"alhle O. and Tak\'acs M., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Sr-85 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{85}$Sr to include the 2018 result of the PTB (Germany), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/58/1A/06006}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2021, \textbf{58}, Tech. Suppl., 06006}
